page.title: 14SILVER CLUB LOWER HEATH
page.content: A meeting of the parishioners of{Fauls was held on 10.10.77 because of the expressed hope of many who took part in the{Queen's Silver Jubillee {Celebrations,}that "Something be done to perpetuate the spirit of fellowship and co-operation".{Fauls Silver club was formed.It has a unique age range of members from 9 weeks to 90 years. It has mixed religions; political views; walks of life:it is a complete cross-section of the community.Its members enjoy a wide range of social and educational activities-{dances, {quizzes,treasure hunts,lectures.}They raise Â£1000's for{charity}and for the {parish.}They have found hidden talent which shows up most in the all-member production of the annual{pantomime - full houses for three nights.Since its formation 8 years ago the Club has become the nucleus of the parish.
